main.name: Paurush
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Paurush Srivastava! A determined Fullstack Developer having around 3 years of experience participating in the complete development lifecycle of successful software applications. I am an enthusiast, a learner, and passionate about multiple Full Stack Web Technologies. I have been working on web development for more than 3 years. The web applications I like to create have JavaScript at the core. Listed are the technologies I am sound with: JavaScript ES6, React.js, Redux, Typescript, HTML5, CSS3, Node.js, Express.js , MongoDB, Azure, Jest, RESTful APIs, Teamcity, Octopus Deploy, Sonarqube, JIRA, Git, Bitbucket, SQL Server, Software Design Patterns, Data Structures, Algorithms, OOP, OOJS.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for any leads!

education.school: National Institue of Science and Technology - Odisha

work.title: Software Development Engineer
work.description: Working as a Fullstack developer for the Dealership Automotive Company on the CRM - Desking Platform. Tech Stack: React.js, Redux, Material UI, TypeScript, JavaScript, SQL Server

work.title: Systems Engineer
work.description: Worked as a Frontend Developer mainly on the Dashboard and Reporting area for the Investment Banking client - Goldman Sachs. Tech Stack: Javascript, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Material UI

testimonials.text: Paurush is very strong with his front end skills (react js). He is very passionate about his learning and growing as an individual in team.
Paurush is most dedicated professional Iâ€™ve worked with. We worked together at Infosys and he helped me a lot to get started and also to understand internal processes.

I know paurush as a hard-working and very serious team player. He is energetic, helpful, positive attitude person. His expertise as a developer considerable and his contribution is valuable to project.
Paurush is a hard working guy having a vast knowledge in his technical field. Apart from academics he is also a good team player and fully dedicated person towards his Goals.
testimonials.user: Ashar Jami (Site Engineer, Muthroot FinCorp Ltd.)

testimonials.text: A hard working and fun loving person, would be the best way to describe Paurush. His optimism at the workplace is appreciable. A curious guy, who never settles for average and puts all his effort to attain perfection in whatever he does.
